argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | oppggic.o | |- O = ( oppG ` G ) |
| 2 |  | oppgcntr.z | |- Z = ( Cntr ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` G ) = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3 | #P_oppgcntz | |- ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ( Base ` G ) ) = ( ( Cntz ` O ) ` ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 5, 3 | #P_cntrval | |- ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ( Base ` G ) ) = ( Cntr ` G ) |
| 7 | 6, 2 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( ( Cntz ` G ) ` ( Base ` G ) ) = Z |
| 8 | 1, 5 | #P_oppgbas | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` O ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Cntz ` O ) = ( Cntz ` O ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_cntrval | |- ( ( Cntz ` O ) ` ( Base ` G ) ) = ( Cntr ` O ) |
| 11 | 4, 7, 10 | #P_3eqtr3i | |- Z = ( Cntr ` O ) |
